title: Samsara Announces 2025 Impact Report: "Building a Safer, More Sustainable World" | User | malvern-online.com
text: New report spotlights how Samsara's AI-powered platform helps customers improve safety, efficiency, and sustainability, while detailing the company's own efforts Samsara Inc. ("Samsara") ( NYSE: IOT ), the pioneer of the Connected Operations ® Platform, is at the forefront of building a safer, more sustainable world alongside its customers. The company’s newly released 2025 Impact Report highlights how its AI-powered platform empowers organizations in the world of physical operations to significantly improve their safety, efficiency, and sustainability. The report also outlines Samsara’s own progress and practices as it builds for the long term. "Our AI-powered platform helps create safer, more efficient operations for our customers’ frontline workers and their communities," said Sanjit Biswas, CEO and co-founder at Samsara. "We've been innovating quickly, and it's exciting to see how the many new products we've introduced since our last report are already driving real results for our customers. Whether it's helping drivers get home safely or saving organizations millions in fuel costs, the impact is transformative." Highlights from Samsara’s 2025 Impact Report include: To read Samsara’s 2025 Impact Report, visit here . About Samsara Samsara ( NYSE: IOT ) is the pioneer of the Connected Operations® Platform, which is an open platform that connects the people, devices, and systems of some of the world’s most complex operations, allowing them to develop actionable insights and improve their operations. With tens of thousands of customers across North America and Europe, Samsara is a proud technology partner to the people who keep our global economy running, including the world’s leading organizations across industries in transportation, construction, wholesale and retail trade, field services, logistics, manufacturing, utilities and energy, government, healthcare and education, food and beverage, and others. The company's mission is to increase the safety, efficiency, and sustainability of the operations that power the global economy. Samsara is a registered trademark of Samsara Inc. All other brand names, product names, or trademarks belong to their respective holders. View source version on businesswire.com: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20251016985906/en/ Stephanie Burke Samsara media@samsara.com
